firsttime.name: Adventurer Rane
firsttime.text:
Hello! I'm Rane!
My job is to introduce you to the world of searching! As you already know, you just need to type </search:1210998667222450276>, but this isn't all. You can also choose the place! You need to just type </search:1210998667222450276> and click the `place` option and choose a location from the list. You can those locations in many different ways. Most common way is simply crafting the Orb of certain place and using it in </use:1188085947233996941>. From searching you can get coins, items, XP, but you can also find nothing. But most importantly remember... Never give up!
Do you have any other questions?

choice1.name: Adventurer Rane
choice1.text:
...
Why do you ask?
I already told you that my name is Rane...
That's all that you need to know...
You don't need to ask for more...

Do you have any other questions?

choice2.name: Adventurer Rane
choice2.text:
Oh my... I should've told about it from the beginning... Hah...
Default locations are used to make using </search:1210998667222450276> easier, by making you not type the location. To set any location as default you just need to use </set default search:1260960054668951718>. Find the location you want and choose it from the list.

Do you have any other questions?

choice3.name: Adventurer Rane
choice3.text:
Merchants! You can sometimes find their shops in different places. You can trade with them item for item. In the Forest there is one merchant, old Kusel Skarrd. His prices are too high...
Do you have any other questions?

choice4.name: Adventurer Rane
choice4.text:
Structures..? What are you talking about..? There is nothing like that in the Forest... Sorry I can't tell you about them...
Any other questions?

itsbad.name: Adventurer Rane
itsbad.text:
...
Why do you keep asking?
This won't give you anything.

reallybro.name: Adventurer Rane
reallybro.text:
...
You should stop...
It'll end better for both of us...

itsjoever.name: Adventurer Rane
itsjoever.text:
Listen...
If you go away now nothing will happen to nobody...
Can I trust you..?

soyoullliveinthevoid.name: Void
soyoullliveinthevoid.text:
*Without any warning you found yourself in the endless void. You felt weird crystal in your inventory.
Can you hear me..?*

You got:
3 XP
